entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
